<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_58056_md_docs_markdown_source"> <x_58056_md_docs_markdown_source action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abstract_syntax_tree/> <added_manually>false</added_manually> <api_markdown>## <a name="script-include-csdataexport"></a>CSDataExport &nbsp;&nbsp;_This is a sample script include for testing the markdown generator. Line 3_
### Type: `Script Include`
### Class: `CSDataExport` &nbsp;&nbsp;_Script include for exporting instances data_
&nbsp;&nbsp;***CSDataExport(dataExportGR)***
### Constructor &nbsp;&nbsp;_Initialize properties_
&nbsp;&nbsp;***new CSDataExport(dataExportGR)***
### Static Properties
#### `CSDataExport.ACTION` = 'put'
#### `CSDataExport.ACTION_PUT_CHUNK` = 'chunk'
#### `CSDataExport.DEBUG` = true
#### `CSDataExport.EXPORT_CHUNK_SIZE` = 10000000
#### `CSDataExport.EXPORT_CHUNK_SUFFIX` = '_chunk.'
#### `CSDataExport.EXPORT_CSV_LIMIT` = 'glide.csv.export.limit'
#### `CSDataExport.EXPORT_EXCEL_LIMIT` = 'glide.excel.export.limit'
#### `CSDataExport.EXPORT_FORMAT_CSV` = 'csv'
#### `CSDataExport.EXPORT_FORMAT_EXCEL` = 'xls'
#### `CSDataExport.EXPORT_FORMAT_XML` = 'xml'
#### `CSDataExport.EXPORT_FROM_REPORT` = 'Report'
#### `CSDataExport.EXPORT_FROM_TABLE` = 'Table'
#### `CSDataExport.EXPORT_MAX_ROWS_TO_EXPORT_NO_LIMIT` = -1
#### `CSDataExport.EXPORT_ROWS_PER_FILE` = 10000
#### `CSDataExport.EXPORT_ROWS_PER_FILE_NO_LIMIT` = -1
#### `CSDataExport.EXPORT_TYPE_FULL` = 'Full'
#### `CSDataExport.EXPORT_TYPE_INCREMENTAL` = 'Incremental'
#### `CSDataExport.EXPORT_XML_LIMIT` = 'glide.xml.export.limit'
#### `CSDataExport.SLEEP_TIME` = 10000
#### `CSDataExport.TRANSFER_METHOD_ATTACHMENT` = 'attachment'
#### `CSDataExport.TRANSFER_METHOD_FTP` = 'ftp'
#### `CSDataExport.TRANSFER_METHOD_FTPS` = 'ftps'
#### `CSDataExport.TRANSFER_METHOD_FTPS_AUTH_TLS` = 'ftps_auth_tls'
#### `CSDataExport.TRANSFER_METHOD_FTPS_IMPL_SSL` = 'ftps_impl_ssl'
#### `CSDataExport.TRANSFER_METHOD_FTPS_IMPL_TLS` = 'ftps_impl_tls'
#### `CSDataExport.TRANSFER_METHOD_LOCAL` = 'local'
#### `CSDataExport.TRANSFER_METHOD_SFTP` = 'sftp'
#### `CSDataExport.USED_MEMORY_THRESHOLD` = "92"
<br /> #### `CSDataExport.exportFile(dataExportGR)` <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters** <div style="margin-left: 10px">
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | _dataExportGR_ | _*_ | _..._ | </div>
### Methods <br /> #### `errorFound()` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Return the error property value_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns** &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;`string` <br /> #### `getErrorMessage()` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Returns the errorMessage property value_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns** &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;`string` <br /> #### `getListColumns(fieldList)` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Converts a list of field names into a GlideChoiceList containing field names and labels_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters** <div style="margin-left: 10px">
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | _fieldList_ | _string_ | _Comma-delimited string of field names_ | </div>
<br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns** &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;`GlideChioceList` <br /> #### `initialize(dataExportGR)` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Initialize properties_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters** <div style="margin-left: 10px">
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | _dataExportGR_ | _GlideRecord_ | _..._ | </div> <br /> #### `process()` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Start the data export process_
<br /> #### `saveAttachment(bytesArray, contentType, fileName)` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Saves a byte array as an attachment_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters** <div style="margin-left: 10px">
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | _bytesArray_ | _byte array_ | _Java byte array_ | | _contentType_ | _string_ | _..._ | | _fileName_ | _string_ | _..._ | </div> <br /> #### `sendFile(bytesArray, fileName, chunkSize)` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Sends file data to a mid server_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters** <div style="margin-left: 10px">
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | _bytesArray_ | _byte array_ | _Java byte array_ | | _fileName_ | _string_ | _..._ | | _chunkSize_ | _integer_ | _Size of data chunks to send separately_ | </div> <br /> #### `sendFileChunk(bytesArray, chunkCtr, fileName)` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Sends a chunk of data to a mid server_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters** <div style="margin-left: 10px">
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | _bytesArray_ | _byte array_ | _Java byte array_ | | _chunkCtr_ | _integer_ | _..._ | | _fileName_ | _string_ | _..._ | </div> <br /> #### `sendFileFinal(chunkCtr, fileName)` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Sends the final chunk of data to a mid server along with an indicator to trigger the mid server to combine the chunks into a single flie_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters** <div style="margin-left: 10px">
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | _chunkCtr_ | _integer_ | _..._ | | _fileName_ | _string_ | _..._ | </div> <br /> #### `setRunProperties(runProperties)` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Set runProperties property_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters** <div style="margin-left: 10px">
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | _runProperties_ | _object_ | _..._ | </div> <br /> #### `_exportFile(exportGroup, query)` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Export data for non-XML exports_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters** <div style="margin-left: 10px">
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | _exportGroup_ | _object_ | _..._ | | _query_ | _string_ | _..._ | </div> <br /> #### `_getExportGroups(exportTableGR)` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Break the record collection to be exported into manageable groups_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters** <div style="margin-left: 10px">
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | _exportTableGR_ | _GlideRecord_ | _..._ | </div>
<br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns** &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;`array` _Collection of objects containing start/end sys_id values_ <br /> #### `_getFileName()` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Builds a file name value_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns** &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;`string` <br /> #### `_getUsedMemoryPct()` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Calculates the percentage of memory currentlu sed by the instance_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns** &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;`decimal` <br /> #### `_handleTargetDestinations(bytesArray, contentType, fileName)` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Saves as an attachment or sends to a target destination a byte array_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters** <div style="margin-left: 10px">
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | _bytesArray_ | _byte array_ | _Java byte array_ | | _contentType_ | _string_ | _Used to set the content type on attachments_ | | _fileName_ | _string_ | _Name to use when attachment or file is created_ | </div> <br /> #### `_logDebug(msg)` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Creates an informational message in the system log if debugging is turned on_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters** <div style="margin-left: 10px">
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | _msg_ | _string_ | _..._ | </div> <br /> #### `_logError(msg)` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Creates an error message in the system log_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters** <div style="margin-left: 10px">
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | _msg_ | _string_ | _..._ | </div> <br /> #### `_logInfo(msg)` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Creates an informational message in the system log_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters** <div style="margin-left: 10px">
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | _msg_ | _string_ | _..._ | </div> <br /> #### `_logProcessEnd()` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Creates a log message showing the date/time the export completed_
<br /> #### `_serializeGlideRecord(gr)` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Create an XML document from a GlideRecord_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters** <div style="margin-left: 10px">
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | _gr_ | _GlideRecord_ | _..._ | </div>
<br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns** &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;`XML document` <br /> #### `_unloadAttachmentsAndImages(gr)` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Export attachments for an XML export_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters** <div style="margin-left: 10px">
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | _gr_ | _GlideRecord_ | _..._ | </div> <br /> #### `_unloadJournal(gr)` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Export journal entries for an XML export_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters** <div style="margin-left: 10px">
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | _gr_ | _GlideRecord_ | _..._ | </div> <br /> #### `_unloadTableRecords(query)` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Export XML data_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters** <div style="margin-left: 10px">
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | _query_ | _string_ | _..._ | </div> <br /> #### `_unloadXML(query, lastIDProcessed)` &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;_Export a group of XML records_ <br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Parameters** <div style="margin-left: 10px">
| Name | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | _query_ | _string_ | _..._ | | _lastIDProcessed_ | _string_ | _..._ | </div>
<br />&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**Returns** &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;`object` </api_markdown> <html/> <markdown_document display_value="KB0010041 v4.0">ef5518c6db513300d0cb5385ca9619bf</markdown_document> <markdown_link>script-include-csdataexport</markdown_link> <order>100</order> <project_code_document_version/> <remote>false</remote> <remote_json/> <remote_source_id/> <show_html>false</show_html> <show_markdown>false</show_markdown> <source_description/> <source_id>e41166e34f836300ecf18c318110c710</source_id> <source_key/> <source_name>Script Include: CSDataExport</source_name> <source_script_field>script</source_script_field> <source_table>sys_script_include</source_table> <source_text/> <source_type>Document</source_type> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-05-10 00:46:59</sys_created_on> <sys_id>675518c6db513300d0cb5385ca9619c4</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-05-15 22:44:21</sys_updated_on> </x_58056_md_docs_markdown_source> </record_update>
